name: Babu Singh Singh
comment: Nice hotel very good service. Staff is cooperative. Rooms are clean and spacious. Food is also good.

name: Muna Ram Megwal
comment: Good stay near airport. Pickup was on time. Room interior is excellent. Thoda costly hai but worth it.

name: Rajesh Kumar
comment: Absolute luxury! The dark theme of the hotel is unique. Loved the AI concierge.

name: Sonia Sharma
comment: Service was slow during check-in. Room was good but expected faster service.

name: Vikram Singh
comment: Best hotel in the city. Highly recommended for business travelers.
